channel.title: How do you make objects give exp?
channel.description: I put new objects in lumby, because I'm basing my server there, but how do I make the objects give exp? Like, how do I make a object say, a chest for example. How do I make it give exp?

item.title: How do you make objects give exp?
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

Depends what source your using.
CheezScape is cases
TestScape is objectID =

it looks like
case OBJECTID:
Whatever you want it to do;
break;

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make objects give exp?

item.source: How do you make objects give exp?

item.title: How do you make objects give exp?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I don’t know! lol, try this
This is for defence(Useing a haybale)

case 299:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 25)
{
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[1]), 1);
actionTimer = 25;
setAnimation(0x320);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

This is for strength(With an opened door)

case 1531:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 25)
{
actionTimer = 25;
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[2]), 2);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

And this is for attack(Hitting a dummy)

case 823:		
if (actionTimer == 25) {
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0);
actionTimer = 25;
}
break;

These are basics from pimpscape sources… Work from there?

Read full topic
